about_the_game:
Free to play on mobile !

Unleash your fury in Arcane Spark, choose between the elements of Earth, Fire, Water and Air, use each with its own characteristics and participate in a battle for the survival of the fittest! Get ready for a massacre between 10 wizards who all seek the same objective, calculate the physics, dodge, attack, jump and use the elements to attack, cover or propel yourself in a frenetic arena full of action that will have you thinking of survival strategies in real time and taking the arcane energy to beat the rest of the wizards!

Key features:
*Master the elements: Find the element capable of breaking through the enemy defense and protect yourself with the element that can stop the enemy attack, use your skills to achieve your goals and overcome your rival.
*Dynamic Combat: Experience fast-paced, strategic battles where your choice of element and your ability to counter your opponents' powers can turn the tide of the fight.
*Competitive Gameplay: Enter a vibrant arena where every match is a test of skill and strategy. Only the strongest and most cunning mages will rise to the top.
*Prepare for intense magical combat and prove your dominance in the realm of Arcane Spark. Will you become the ultimate elemental champion?

Join the battle, master the elements, and let your Arcane Spark shine the brightest!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 32 or 64 bit operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo a 2.2 GHz, AMD Athlon 64 X2 a 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Unleash your elemental fury in Arcane Spark, the ultimate competitive magic combat game! Choose from the four classical elements - Earth, Fire, Water, and Air - each with its unique strengths and weaknesses, and engage in thrilling free-for-all battles against other players.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
